name: MMM-weatherforecast
description: This is a new version of the weather forecast module. This one does not come as a default module. This version has been edited to allow the days of the week to span left to right, each with its own weather icon and details. Uses openweathermap.org API Key.
outdated: Abandoned. The author no longer maintains this module.

name: MMM-WeatherGraph
description: Weather forecast with rain & temp graphs. Lots of options to turn on & off. Data from OpenWeatherMap API.

name: MMM-WeatherHourlyByDay
description: Displays an hourly forecast table for multiple days. Allows you to specify what hours of the day to include and which forecast components will be displayed.

name: MMM-WeatherOrNot
description: Squeeze or stretch it. Watch it respond by reformatting itself. Fully customizable. Contrary to the description in the README, the DarkSky API is not used.

name: MMM-WeatherOutfit
description: Presents appropriate outfit depending on current outside temperature received from Otto Paulsen's outstanding MQTT module.

name: MMM-WebHookAlerts
description: Displays HTTP POST webhook notifications on screen and supports templates for alert message formatting.

name: MMM-WebSpeechTTS
description: A Text-To-Speech module which uses the Web Speech API of the browser. It is in an early stage of development. So far only German is supported.

name: MMM-Webuntis
description: It allows you to display your kids' canceled and irregular lessons for schools using Untis software to organize school's timetables.

name: MMM-WebView
description: Embed any web pages by using a webview instead of an iframe.

name: MMM-weconnectid
description: Shows Status of your VW ID Car based on We Connect.

name: MMM-WeeklySchedule
description: Display weekly recurring timetables such as class schedules.

name: MMM-WestBerksBinDay
description: Displays next refuse and recycling collections for West Berkshire (UK) houses based on Unique Property Reference Number.

name: MMM-WetterOnline
description: Display weather data from WetterOnline.

name: MMM-WH2600
description: This module integrates a WH2600 System to display several statistics like temperature and humidity for all registered sensors, wind data, UV index and rain data.

name: MMM-WhisperGPT
description: Adds a personal ChatGPT (3.5) voice-controlled (through PicoVoice, Whisper, Mimic3) assistant.

name: MMM-whoshome
description: Get info about who is home, based on ping to cell phone. Like Mrs. Weasley clock.

name: MMM-Widget
description: Inserting, evaluating, excuting external web widgets on MM.

name: MMM-WienerLinien
description: Display Public Transport timetable of Vienna/Austria.

name: MMM-WiFiPassword
description: Displays WiFi password and QRCode.

name: MMM-wiki
description: Displays random Wikipedia snippets.

name: MMM-windy
description: Adds the windy weather map which covers the whole screen.

name: MMM-WMATA
description: Display WMATA Bus and Train arrival times. Rewritten version from MMM-DCMetroTimes and MMM-DCMetroTrainTimes.

name: MMM-WordGenius
description: Displays the WordGenius.com word of the day along with its part of speech, pronunciation, definition, and occasionally, its origin.

name: MMM-wordnik
description: Get the word of the day, its definition, and origin.

name: MMM-WordOfTheDay
description: Displays the Merriam-Webster word of the day along with its part of speech, pronunciation, definition, and an example.

name: MMM-Worldclock
description: Display local time of several locations. Fully supported and updated.

name: MMM-WorldTides
description: Displays low and high water time predictions for a given tide station, derived from worldtides.info.

name: MMM-WOTD
description: Yet another word of the day module. The special feature of this module is that you can select multiple languages and it will display as a carousel.

name: MMM-WS281X-Server
description: Have ws2812 LEDs on your mirror with RPI-WS2812-Server.

name: wuforecast
description: Weather Underground Forecast Module retrieves forecast from Weather Underground. Also adds a percentage probability of precipitation to forecast display.
outdated: Deprecated. Wunderground API isn't working anymore.

name: MMM-WunderGround
description: Display weather based on wunderground API.
outdated: Deprecated. Wunderground API isn't working anymore. Check out MMM-MyWeather which is a fork with another API.

name: MMM-wundergroundBar
description: Minimalist Weather for the bottom_bar or thirds position of your mirror.
outdated: Deprecated. Wunderground API isn't working anymore.

name: MMM-WWI
description: Nope! Not World War I. It's Weather Without Icons. Up to the minute weather. Full weather information, yet a small footprint.
outdated: Deprecated. DarkSky API no longer works since 2023-03-31.

name: MMM-XDG-OPEN
description: Opens a file, URL, etc using default applications for a particular MIME, all done by using the Notification Mechanism.

name: MMM-xiaomi
description: Integrate temperature and humidity from your xiaomi smarthome system.

name: MMM-XKCD
description: Displays either the daily XKCD comic or a random XKCD comic.

name: MMM-Yahrzeit
description: Displays Yahrzeit (anniversary of a death according to the Jewish calendar).

name: MMM-yandex-route
description: Displays car routes on the map, using Yandex.Maps API.

name: MMM-Year-Progress
description: Track the progress of the current year / month.

name: MMM-Yeelight
description: Display the status of Yeelight bulbs in your local network.

name: MMM-yijv
description: Instead of default compliments with classical poems, just supports Chinese. 随机产生一句古诗词。.

name: MMM-YNAB
description: Displays categories of your choosing from your YNAB budget.

name: MMM-YouLess
description: This module reads from a YouLess energy meter in your network to display realtime energy usage information.

name: MMM-YouLess2
description: This module reads from a YouLess energy meter in your network to display a gauge of realtime energy usage information. It´s a optimized fork from QNimbus first module.

name: MMM-YouTube-API
description: Enables easy integration of YouTube videos.

name: MMM-YouTube-Live-Stream
description: Check if a YouTube channel if streaming. If it is, it plays the live stream.

name: MMM-YouTubeWebView
description: Embed YouTube videos and playlists using the Electron webview tag rather than an iframe. May assist access to YouTube videos blocked in an iframe.

name: MMM-YrNow
description: The official Yr Nowcast module for MagicMirror², which displays data from Yr. Nowcast data is only available for some Norwegian locations covered by the Norwegian weather radars. Yr is a weather service from the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation and the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.

name: MMM-YrThen
description: Displays weather forecast from Yr. Yr is a weather service from the Norwegian Broadcasting Corporation and the Norwegian Meteorological Institute.

name: MMM-YT-SubCount
description: Show the subscription from Youtube Channel.

name: MMM-ZAPTEC
description: Display ZAPTEC charging API.

name: MMM-Zmanim
description: Displays daily Jewish calendar information.

name: MMM-Zmanim
description: Displays Zmanim (Jewish calendar information).
